recipes.name: Biryani
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt and spices
Cook rice with whole spices until 70% done
Layer rice and meat alternately
Top with fried onions and saffron
Cook on dum (sealed pot) for 45 minutes
Serve with boiled eggs and salad

recipes.name: Bhuna Khichuri
instructions: Roast dal, sautÃ© vegetables, add rice and dal, cook with spices until done.

recipes.name: Morog Polao
instructions: Marinate chicken, cook with rice and spices, finish with ghee and fried onions.

recipes.name: Shorshe Ilish
instructions: Marinate fish, cook in mustard paste and spices, finish with mustard oil.

recipes.name: Panta Ilish
instructions: Soak rice overnight, fry fish, serve with rice, chili, and mustard oil.

recipes.name: Chingri Malai Curry
instructions: SautÃ© prawns, cook with coconut milk and spices until thickened.

recipes.name: Bhapa Pitha
instructions: Fill rice flour with coconut and jaggery, steam until set.

recipes.name: Fuchka (Puchka)
instructions: Make puris, fill with potato-chickpea mix, top with tamarind water and spices.

recipes.name: Patishapta
instructions: Make thin crepes, fill with coconut-jaggery mix, roll up and serve.

recipes.name: Shemai
instructions: Roast vermicelli in ghee, cook with milk, sugar, and cardamom until thickened.

recipes.name: Kacchi Biryani
instructions: Marinate mutton, layer with rice, potatoes, and fried onions, cook on dum until tender.

recipes.name: Doi Begun
instructions: Fry eggplant, mix with yogurt and spices, garnish with green chili.

recipes.name: Shutki Bhorta
instructions: Fry dried fish, mash with onion, chili, and mustard oil.

recipes.name: Lau Chingri
instructions: Cook gourd and prawns with onion, chili, and spices until tender.

recipes.name: Chingri Bhorta
instructions: Fry prawns, mash with onion, chili, and mustard oil.

recipes.name: Dhokar Dalna
instructions: Make dal cakes, fry, cook in tomato-spice gravy with potatoes.

recipes.name: Begun Bhorta
instructions: Roast eggplant, mash with onion, chili, and mustard oil.

recipes.name: Murgir Jhol
instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables with spices until tender.

recipes.name: Bhindi Bhaji
instructions: SautÃ© okra and onion with chili and spices until cooked.

recipes.name: Payesh
instructions: Simmer rice in milk with sugar, cardamom, and bay leaf until thick and creamy.

recipes.name: Shorshe Bata Maach
instructions: Marinate fish, cook in mustard paste and spices, finish with mustard oil.

recipes.name: Chingri Bhuna
instructions: SautÃ© prawns with onion, tomato, and spices until cooked and thickened.

recipes.name: Aloo Bhorta
instructions: Boil potatoes, mash with onion, chili, mustard oil, and salt.

recipes.name: Dimer Dalna
instructions: Fry eggs and potatoes, cook in onion-tomato gravy with spices.

recipes.name: Kumro Bhorta
instructions: Boil pumpkin, mash with onion, chili, mustard oil, and salt.

recipes.name: Murgir Roast
instructions: Marinate chicken, roast with onions, yogurt, and spices until tender.

recipes.name: Shami Kabab
instructions: Cook meat and dal, grind, shape into patties, fry until golden.

recipes.name: Bhapa Doi
instructions: Mix all ingredients, steam until set, chill before serving.

recipes.name: Murgir Rezala
instructions: Marinate chicken, cook with yogurt, onions, ghee, and spices until tender.

recipes.name: Panta Bhath
instructions: Soak rice overnight, serve with salt, chili, and onion.

recipes.name: Chitol Macher Muitha
instructions: Make fish dumplings, fry, cook in spicy gravy with potatoes and onions.

recipes.name: Pui Shak Chingri
instructions: Cook spinach and prawns with onion, chili, and spices until tender.

recipes.name: Bhapa Ilish
instructions: Coat fish with mustard paste and spices, steam until cooked through.

recipes.name: Kolar Bora
instructions: Mash bananas, mix with flour, sugar, and cardamom, fry spoonfuls until golden.

recipes.name: Shorshe Pabda
instructions: Cook fish in mustard paste, chili, turmeric, and salt until tender.

recipes.name: Daler Bora
instructions: Grind soaked lentils, mix with onion, chili, and spices, fry spoonfuls until crisp.

recipes.name: Kacha Aamer Chutney
instructions: Cook mango with sugar, mustard seeds, and salt until thick and jammy.

recipes.name: Shutki Bhorta (Dried Fish Mash)
instructions: Fry dried fish, mash with onion, chili, and mustard oil.

recipes.name: Chingri Bhorta (Prawn Mash)
instructions: Fry prawns, mash with onion, chili, and mustard oil.

recipes.name: Doi Chingri
instructions: Marinate prawns in yogurt and spices, cook with onion, ginger, and garlic until thickened.

recipes.name: Shorshe Rui
instructions: Cook rohu fish in mustard paste, chili, turmeric, and salt until tender.

recipes.name: Bhapa Chingri
instructions: Mix prawns with mustard paste, coconut, chili, and salt, steam until cooked.

recipes.name: Kumro Chingri
instructions: Cook pumpkin and prawns with onion, chili, and spices until tender.

recipes.name: Doi Potol
instructions: Fry potol, cook in yogurt and spices until tender.

recipes.name: Shorshe Begun
instructions: Fry eggplant, cook in mustard paste, chili, and spices until soft.

recipes.name: Murgir Jhal Fry
instructions: Fry chicken with onion, ginger, garlic, chili, and spices until crisp and spicy.

recipes.name: Daler Puri
instructions: Make dough with dal, flour, and spices, roll out, fry until golden.

recipes.name: Panta Ilish Bhorta
instructions: Soak rice overnight, fry fish, mash with chili, mustard oil, and salt, serve with rice.

recipes.name: Chingri Bhorta Special
instructions: Fry prawns, mash with onion, chili, and mustard oil. Add extra green chili for heat.

recipes.name: Mishti Doi
instructions: Boil milk, add sugar, cool, mix in yogurt, set overnight until thick and sweet.
